title: ****PLEASE MAKE ARURF A PERMANENT GAME MODE****
body:
Riot

I have been playing League since 2012. I play for fun and I do play ranked but I am almost 40, have 2 kids and a full-time job in which I travel. I am not great by any stretch but I do have some skills and enjoy the fun that League has been. 

That being said there has been nothing new when it comes to maps for 6 years.... And SR has become pretty toxic and very boring most of the time. Someone decides to rework champs and completely change their play style which doesn't change the game. It actually might drive some to play less as now they are thrown off, getting flamed because they have to "relearn" new champs.

URF is finally a break from the monotony that SR has become. 

Please make URF a permanent game mode that we can enjoy. Hell, I would even like to see URF ranked / tournament play. Even if you are skilled at a champ, URF can level the playing field. 

****PLEASE KEEP URF PERMANENTLY****
